item.title: Shipping Items with Meest
item.description: How to send a parcel from the USA to Ukraine through Meest 1. Collect items Warm children’s clothing are frequently requested items. Natural fibers, like wool and cotton, have better thermal qualities than synthetic fibers, like polyester or nylon. Some ideas: $20 Set of wool toddler hats and a pair of gloves $30 pack of Two 55% Cotton girl sweater … send more suggestions on Twitter to @dkotik 2. Pack the box Use [box size 16x16x16](https://www.
